summary: If you found the default Silly Huge funny, this will make you die of laughter.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]I made this because I found it funny in the sexy way. I mean, just imagine seeing the people of skyrim walking around with bodies like these?  However, I tried to convert armor to work with this (Killer Keos' skimpy armor, of coarse), but I found out that I am terrible at it.  So, I decided to post this to the nexus to let others enjoy it!  My only request is that if you do make a conversion of it, please post it as I have done with this and tell me so I may link it.  I feel that, as a community, we can start something great!  If you have any thoughts or questions, please leave them in the comments!  Thats why the nexus has one, after all!
[/size]
[size=4]I reccomend that you use the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT by ChronoTrigger77[/url]You will have to convert the outfits to the body yourself, but it is worth it![/size]
author: Nkromancer
